description: ERECTION OF A DETACHED TWO BEDROOM HOUSE WITH PARKING SPACE INCLUDING PROVISION OF A PARKING SPACE ON FRONTAGE OF NO 4.
decision_conditions: Condition : 0 - (1) by reason of its size and shape the site is considered unsuitable to accommodate a detached dwelling as proposed. (2) The proposal would result in an unduly cramped and unneighbourly form of development detrimental to the amenities of occupiers of adjoining residential properties. (3) The proposed house would detract from the visual amenities of the locality and adversely affect the street scene by reason of its projection in advance of the main front building line of adjoining houses. (1) by reason of its size and shape the site is considered unsuitable to accommodate a detached dwelling as proposed.  (2) The proposal would result in an unduly cramped and unneighbourly form of development detrimental to the amenities of occupiers of adjoining residential properties. (3) The proposed house would detract from the visual amenities of the locality and adversely affect the street scene by reason of its projection in advance of the main front building line of adjoining houses.
